name: Nudity Tagger
description: Tags movies and TV shows with nudity/sexual content warnings from IMDB Parents Guide
overview: Automatically scrapes IMDB Parents Guide and tags your library with content warnings like Brief Nudity, Full Nudity, Sexual Content, etc.

versions.changelog: Bug fixes: Fixed path traversal edge case, optimized delay to skip cache hits, fixed overly broad keyword matching, removed redundant code

Performance improvements: Optimized keyword matching (~10x faster), retry logic for failed requests, automatic cache cleanup, enhanced HTML parsing with multiple fallback strategies, expanded keyword lists, and improved error handling
Security fixes: Path traversal protection, IMDB ID validation, URL encoding, HttpClient timeout, input validation, tag sanitization, and improved error handling
Fixed version display, added version to DLL filename, improved tagline/overview display
